misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a familiar face at Kurk Golf, brings a unique dimension to the greens. While he identifies as male, his journey of self-discovery has led him to explore his gender identity, occasionally leading to participation in tournaments under the guise of his female alter ego, Eva.

With a consistent presence at the Hector Trophée since its inception, Marcus approaches the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 marking his twelfth appearance at the event with unwavering determination. While the Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication to the sport remains steadfast.
Known for his calculated approach and meticulous attention to detail, Marcus is a formidable competitor. Opponents know that facing Marcus is a challenge that requires both skill and strategy.
